inputs.remark: 缺少V2 post surgery follow up 结果

logic_summary: Extracted V2 post-surgery follow-up details from Section 3.6 and Fig 3.3.
Added new encounter V2 dated April 2012 with history of surgery outcomes (dizziness, facial weakness) and audiological results (Left ear PTA 47 dB, SRT 45 dB, WRS 92%).

history.present_illness: Postoperative follow-up 11 months after initial exam. Patient reports dizziness and left-sided facial weakness following surgery. Reports decrease in hearing sensitivity in the left ear.
history.medical_psych_history: Unable to continue profession as construction worker due to lingering dizziness; receiving counseling from Vocational Rehabilitation.

tests.name: Pure-tone audiometry
tests.key_findings: Significant decrease in hearing sensitivity at 250 to 8000 Hz in the left ear compared to baseline.

tests.name: Speech audiometry
tests.key_findings: SRT consistent with PTA. Word recognition score is 92%.
